BattleMusic: I Can't Stop by Punch Deck

Start.Dialogue: Finally you’re here! Time to kill the boss and take his place!

1.Dialogue: How lovely! An enterprising employee… You deserve a raise!
1.Speaker: Boss

2.Dialogue: Oh I'm coming for more than just a raise boss-man! I’m coming for it all!
2.Speaker: Protagonist

3.Dialogue: Well, in the conference room then! SHOWDOWN!
3.Speaker: Boss
